Table1.News content: California has announced a package of assistance for small businesses impacted by COVID-19, including $500 million in grants. Grant applications will be accepted December 30, 2020, through January 8, 2021.

Table1.News content: COVID-19 has highlighted existing inequities in health. California is taking action to identify and address health inequities.
Free training resources are available to all California educators to strengthen their remote teaching skills.
